Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to Joseph Haydn

Joseph Haydn

Différentes petites pièces faciles et agréables

before 1786

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 30' 30"

  • 1. Andante in D major
  • 2. Allegretto in G major
  • 3. Adagio in B-flat major
  • 4. Menuet in B-flat major
  • 5. Allegretto in E-flat major
  • 6. Allegretto in E-flat major
  • 7. Adagio in F major, Hob. XVII:9*
  • 8. Allegro in B-flat major
  • 9. Andante in A major
  • 10. Allegretto in G major

This is a collection comprising nine arrangements and one original work for piano. The set is possibly spurious.

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · XII, 3 · HN 5312 · Streichquartette Opus 20 und Opus 33 · ed. Georg Feder / Sonja Gerlach [no. 10]
  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · XIX/XX · HN 5502 · Klavierstücke für Klavier zu zwei Händen / Werke für Klavier zu vier Händen · ed. Sonja Gerlach
  • Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · XIX/XX · HN 5501 · Klavierstücke für Klavier zu zwei Händen / Werke für Klavier zu vier Händen · ed. Sonja Gerlach
  • Henle · HN 224 · Klavierstücke / Klaviervariationen · ed. Sonja Gerlach
  • Henle · HN 225 · Klavierstücke / Klaviervariationen · ed. Sonja Gerlach
  • Könemann · K 219 · Klavierstücke II · ed. Miklós Dolinszky
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50047 · Klavierstücke · ed. Franz Eibner / Gerschon Jarecki [nos. 7 and 10]
  • Edition HH · HH231.SOL · ed. Christopher Hogwood

1. Andante in D major

This is an arrangement of the second movement of the symphony in G major (Hob. I:81).

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Allegretto in G major

This is an arrangement of the aria Io son poverina from the opera La vera costanza (Hob. XXVIII:8).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

3. Adagio in B-flat major

This is an arrangement of the second movement of the symphony in F major (Hob. I:79).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2

4. Menuet in B-flat major

This is an arrangement of the third movement of the symphony in B-flat major (Hob. I:85).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 1.5

5. Allegretto in E-flat major

This is an arrangement of the second movement of the symphony in B-flat major (Hob. I:85).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

6. Allegretto in E-flat major

This is an arrangement of the second part of the sinfonia to the opera La vera costanza (Hob. XXVIII:8).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

7. Adagio in F major, Hob. XVII:9*

The seventh piece in the collection is not an arrangement, but an original work for piano (Hob. XVII:9*).

8. Allegro in B-flat major

This is an arrangement of the vivace (Signori via calmate) from the introduzione to the opera La vera costanza (Hob. XXVIII:8).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

9. Andante in A major

This is an arrangement of the second movement of the symphony in D major (Hob. I:53).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2

10. Allegretto in G major

This is an arrangement of the fourth movement of the string quartet in G major (Hob. III:41).

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
